actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to limit the exportation of raw materials from the United States whenever any domestic person or the United States establishes and operates a plan for the allocation of such raw materials.

summary.text: Limits the exportation of raw materials from the United States whenever any domestic person or the United States establishes and operates a plan for the allocation of such raw materials.

titles.title: A bill to limit the exportation of raw materials from the United States whenever any domestic person or the United States establishes and operates a plan for the allocation of such raw materials.
